fields.name: default
fields.label: Centered
fields.description: Centered content with a navigation on top.

fields.name: left
fields.label: Left Navigation
fields.description: Content on the right side, navigation on the left.

fields.name: top_fixed
fields.label: Top Navigation Fixed
fields.description: Fixed navigation at top, content below.

fields.name: unibas_brand
fields.label: Brand Panel Style
fields.description: Modern style with colored brand panel at top, white navigation bar, and dark mode support.

fields.name: minimal_modern
fields.label: Minimal Modern
fields.description: Clean, content-focused design with transparent navbar, floating scroll button, card-based layout, and smooth animations. Perfect for modern research platforms and digital humanities projects.

fields.name: glass_harmony
fields.label: Glass Harmony
fields.description: Elegant glassmorphism design with frosted glass UI elements, translucent containers, and beautiful backdrop blur effects. Features animated gradient backgrounds and premium aesthetics. Perfect for modern, visually-striking presentations.
